description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hordes of creatures from a distant planet want capture our poor animals. You can not allow that. You are our last chance. Be the commander and the strategist. This is a Tower Defense. This is Impact of Towers.
